periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Isolated showers and thunderstorms before 4am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 73. South southwest wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers between 7am and 10am, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 92, with temperatures falling to around 89 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly clear. Low around 76, with temperatures rising to around 78 overnight. South southwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 93. Heat index values as high as 105. West southwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 4am, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 74. North northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 10am, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 89. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 75. South wind around 2 mph.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 90. South southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 75. South southwest wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 91. South southwest wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 76. South wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 93. South southwest wind 5 to 8 mph.

periods.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
periods.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 76. South southwest wind around 7 mph.
